name: commandcraft
description: Web based gui for constructing Minecraft commands

scripts.exportValues: mongoexport -h ds039507.mongolab.com:39507 -d commandcraft -c values -u gitHubUser -p f*ckPassw3rds --out data/values.json
scripts.importValues: mongoimport -h ds039507.mongolab.com:39507 -d commandcraft -c values -u gitHubUser -p f*ckPassw3rds --file data/values.json --upsert

author: Jesse Hattabaugh
